title: Demographic Details
description: Demographic information such as name, gender, and birth date of an individual.This field group contains fields that could be used to collect data that may be considered sensitive or personal. Go here https://www.adobe.com/go/xdm-spi-and-pii for more information.

xdm:person.title: Person
xdm:person.description: An individual actor, contact, or owner.
